metadata.dc:author: Clarós, P
Clarós, A
Arimany, J
González-Enseñat, M A
Vincente, M A
metadata.dc:description: Frey's syndrome is distinguished by the appearing of erythema, sensation of hotness, sometimes pain, and transpiration discharge in the preauricular and temporal area when ingestion stars. We present an eleven month old child with this pathology and we review the etiology and clinic manifestations of this syndrome.
metadata.dc:title: Síndrome de Frey en la infancia.
[Frey syndrome in childhood].
